programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

programme.title: The Vibe
programme.desc: The Vibe is a 30-minute TV show that runs daily on weekdays on CGTN. The content focuses on exciting new trends, fashion, and cultural topics across a range of disciplines both in China and abroad. The host presents various culture-related topics in a fun way while also doing some in-depth analysis to give viewers a fuller picture as to what is happening, and why it matters.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a featherweight battle that ends in a brutal knockout between Daniel Ponce De Leon and Antonio Escalante, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing Ricardo Mayorga in a light middleweight title fight, the first of two bouts between the two, that features an exciting last-minute finish. Also on the card, action from former champs Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz.

programme.title: Nagoya, Japan: Show 1
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Harumafuji, Kotooshu, Goeido and Kotoshogiku from the Nagoya basho, 2015.

programme.title: Men's Forms Championship
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the CMX Weapons Championship and the Men's Forms Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO & IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: Rabat 2023 - Episode 2
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. The last edition of Karate 1 Premier League in Rabat saw nearly 200 athletes from 44 countries participating in this event, one of the most prestigious in the world of Karate. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League is back in Rabat, Morocco.

Episode 4 of 4.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Kim Clavel vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: The WBO & IBF Light Flyweight World Championship will be at stake when Kim Clavel steps into the ring in her home of Laval, Quebec, Canada to challenge the champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina. The former WBC World Champion, Clavel boasts a 17-1 record, recently rebounding from a decision loss to Yesica Nery Plata where she dropped her title.

programme.title: Rabat 2023 - Episode 2
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. The last edition of Karate 1 Premier League in Rabat saw nearly 200 athletes from 44 countries participating in this event, one of the most prestigious in the world of Karate. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League is back in Rabat, Morocco.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a featherweight battle that ends in a brutal knockout between Daniel Ponce De Leon and Antonio Escalante, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing Ricardo Mayorga in a light middleweight title fight, the first of two bouts between the two, that features an exciting last-minute finish. Also on the card, action from former champs Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz.

programme.title: Nagoya, Japan: Show 1
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Harumafuji, Kotooshu, Goeido and Kotoshogiku from the Nagoya basho, 2015.

programme.title: Men's Forms Championship
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the CMX Weapons Championship and the Men's Forms Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 4 of 4.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Jan Zaveck vs. Andre Berto
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features the IBF Welterweight title bout, Jan Zaveck, aka 'Mr. Sympathicus', (31-1, 18 KOs) vs. Andre Berto (27-1, 21 KOs) from Beau Rivage Resort and Casino in Biloxi, Mississippi, USA, on September 3, 2011. Andre Berto, coming off losing the WBC title to Victor Ortiz, was looking for vengeance against Zaveck.

programme.title: Tokyo Grand Slam
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tokyo Grand Slam where the home nation is looking to dominate as they fielded 7 of Japan's 8 world champions. Plus we catch up with Japan's brother and sister superstars, the Abe's.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.desc: The Envoy of Wisdom sympathised with mankind in their affliction, he swore to save all living beings before becoming a Buddha. He had transmigration of his soul into human being and named as HUI TAK (Lam Ka Tung)._x000D__x000D_TAK was very clever but aloof from fame and wealth. He admired a famous doctor’s granddaughter FUNG (Chan Miu Ying) and they were intimate to each other. On the other hand, PRINCESS MAN SHUI (Tong Ying Ying) liked TAK very much because of his intelligence.

programme.title: Fate of The Clairvoyant
programme.desc: Pui (Amy Chan) was a dutiful wife and mother. She devoted all her time to her family and didn’t realize her unattractive outlook was driving her husband away. She was shocked when she discovered her husband, Wo (Keung Tai Wai), was having an affair with the sexy movie star, Ling (Valerie Chow). Her heart broke when Wo asked for a divorce._x000D__x000D_Pui’s confidence was badly shattered.

programme.title: Go With The Float
programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yat’s late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). They reminisce about the old days. The chums even regroup and shoot a movie based on a completed screenplay entitled Flying Skill from yesteryear.

programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Mas Sapi Gantengnya Emang Beda
programme.desc: Ikhsan intends to work in the city, but the city dwellers annoy him with their arrogant behavior. Ikhsan is forced to return to work at his father Mawar's cattle farm. Mawar is madly in love with Ikhsan.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: Batagor 3 Cinta
programme.desc: Andra, who is modestly dressed but also handsome, is very popular with the girls on campus. Nina has been Andra's friend since childhood, but she also has feelings for him. However, Nina is not the only one who likes Andra; there are also Ayu, Prita, and Clara. Andra is dating Prita but is jealous of Nina. Andra's love life is complicated.

programme.title: ANAK BAND
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Cintaku Tanpa WO-mu Seperti Mati Lampu
programme.desc: Ajeng and Chandra's mothers are close friends who want their two children to be together so that they can become in-laws. Ajeng and Chandra agree to their mothers' request by pretending to be in a relationship. However, due to their closeness, the mothers plan to marry Ajeng and Chandra off immediately.

programme.title: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg BusinessWeek
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring together the latest news from the world of business and finance by harnessing the power of Bloomberg Businessweek reporters and editors.

programme.title: Inside Stargate: OpenAI's $500 Billion AI Factory (Part 1)
programme.desc: Emily goes inside Stargate, an historic $500 billion bet on the future of AI. She speaks with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman & Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son about their hopes for the project.

programme.title: Inside Stargate: OpenAI's $500 Billion AI Factory (Part 2)
programme.desc: Emily goes inside Stargate, an historic $500 billion bet on the future of AI. She speaks with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman & Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son about their hopes for the project.

programme.title: Microsoft: The Tech Giant's 50 Years (Part 1)
programme.desc: Emily Chang speaks with Microsoft titans Bill Gates, Steve Ballmer and Satya Nadella about the company's journey from scrappy startup to global powerhouse.

programme.title: Microsoft: The Tech Giant's 50 Years (Part 2)
programme.desc: Emily Chang speaks with Microsoft titans Bill Gates, Steve Ballmer and Satya Nadella about the company's journey from scrappy startup to global powerhouse.

programme.title: Melinda French Gates
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Melinda French Gates in Seattle to discuss how she's navigating her next stage as a philanthropist and investor.

programme.title: Salesforce's Marc Benioff
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Salesforce Co-Founder & CEO Marc Benioff to discuss the rise of AI agents and what it's like to run a very memeable global tech company.

programme.title: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex
programme.desc: Meghan, the Duchess of Sussex, opens up in a wide-ranging interview with Emily Chang about life beyond the royal spotlight and her latest ventures in business and entertainment.

programme.title: Super Intelligence
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: Animal Communication
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: Quantum Computing
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: Next Billion
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: Beyond Earth: Private Ambitions in Space
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of India's private space firms and their recent advances. Leaders and innovators divulge how they are pushing the boundaries of space.

programme.title: How Korean Pop Culture Is Transforming Design
programme.desc: Amid Seoul's pulsating energy, Haslinda Amin reveals an architectural renaissance that's reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: The Nation Where Robots and Humans Get Along
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life. From drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, see how it's paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Can Global Shipping Go Green?
programme.desc: South Korea is emerging as a pivotal force in reshaping maritime transportation, leading the way to a future with autonomous ships and more eco-friendly propulsion systems.

programme.title: Does the Perfect City Exist?
programme.desc: Singapore has transformed itself from a colonial outpost into a thriving metropolis boasting unparalleled infrastructure, seamless transportation and accessible housing.

programme.title: Rebirth of the World's Original Tech Giant
programme.desc: Japan is seeing a renaissance in its chip industry. Spearheaded by giants and startups alike, what lessons are there for the world as this digital transformation takes shape?

programme.title: David Blitzer's Sports Investment Playbook
programme.desc: The hosts sit with David Blitzer, co-founder of Harris Blitzer Sports & Entertainment, to discuss how his teams use data and analytics to improve the fan experience.

programme.title: Principles With Bill Belichick and Ray Dalio
programme.desc: The hosts sit for a special conversation with two titans, football coach Bill Belichick and Bridgewater founder Ray Dalio, to learn their guiding principles for success.

programme.title: How Youth Sports Became a $38 Billion Play
programme.desc: Major League Baseball Hall of Famer Cal Ripken Jr. and his brother Bill have turned youth sports into big business. But can they chase profits while preserving what's best for kids?

programme.title: NBA President Stokes Africa's Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Toronto Raptors President Masai Ujiri leads the only non-US team in the National Basketball Association, and he's spearheading an effort to take the game global.

programme.title: Shahid Khan Wants to Marry the NFL and EPL
programme.desc: Shahid Khan owns two teams, one in the National Football League and the other in the English Premier League. He's got an ambitious playbook to boost both kinds of football around the world.

programme.title: Women's Soccer Wants to Be More Like the NFL
programme.desc: National Women's Soccer League Commissioner Jessica Berman is presiding over a pivotal moment for women's soccer. Can she help turn astronomical growth into a sustained business?

programme.desc: A policeman, Raj, nabs a terrorist, Wasim Khan, and is praised by his father-in-law, another high-ranking officer. However, when his father-in-law is mysteriously killed, Raj is blamed for the murder. Release Year: 2001 Director: N. Maharajan

programme.title: RRR

programme.desc: Having a beautiful mother may be a source of pride for other children, but not for Maura. Maura is upset because her mother, Mili, is more well-known than she is. programme.title: Gadis Kosmos
programme.desc: Trilogi Kekasih Elektrik dan Aku, Mawar & Makhluk Asing di mana Bart dan Amri berada di fasa perpisahan dengan pasangan mereka. Seorang wanita cantik muncul mengisi hati kecewa mereka.

programme.title: Kami Geng Bola
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan debat secara santai, komedi dan berat sebelah mengenai semua perlawanan tumpuan di liga domestic dan antarbangsa. Rancangan ini akan dihoskan oleh Dato' Afdlin Shauki.

programme.title: Bukan Syurga Pilihan
programme.desc: Desakan Tihani untuk menyuruh Megat Arif melepaskannya terus bermain di fikiran Megat Arif. Adakah Megat Arif akan melepaskan Tihani sebagai tanda kasihan di atas perbuatan Datuk Ilya?

programme.title: Sejuta Rasa Buat Adelia
programme.desc: Chef Adelia terpaksa menempuh sejuta perasaan dan rasa, demi membuktikan kebolehannya untuk memasak apabila mendapat tahu lelaki yang mengkritik makanannya adalah bos barunya, Idlan.

programme.title: Kutinggalkan Cinta di Okinawa
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Alisa yang cuba untuk menjejaki ibu kandungnya. Sepanjang perjalanan itu dia mengenali Raykal dan Shun. Siapakah di antara dua lelaki ini yang dapat memenangi hati Alisa?

programme.title: Kak Kek & Abe Mmasok
programme.desc: Siapa yang rindu dengan celoteh Kak Kek boleh tengok Kak Kek dalam rancangan terbarunya, Kak Kek & Abe Mmasok!

programme.title: Bunga Hati
programme.desc: Seorang gadis miskin berdepan dengan konflik antara ibu yang membencinya dan abangnya yang cacat serta terperangkap dalam cinta tiga segi antara kekasih pertama dan doktor jutawan.

programme.title: Unplugged 2019
programme.desc: Persembahan artis-artis tempatan dengan gabungan lagu baru dan lama bersama hos Elly Arifin dalam membongkar rahsia di sebalik pembikinan lagu tersebut.

programme.title: Dahlia
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Cinta Tiada Ganti
programme.desc: Mengisahkan percintaan yang penuh dengan emosi dan dugaan antara Ara dan Ashraf.

programme.title: Aiman Tempe Mania The Series
programme.desc: Aiman yang berumur 6 tahun petah bercakap dan berfikiran lebih matang sentiasa membantu orang disekelilingi untuk menyelesaikan masalah mereka.

programme.title: Win My Baby Back
programme.desc: Kehidupan tidak seindah impian Nha Linh dan Quy Khanh apabila bekas teman wanita Nha Linh tiba-tiba muncul dan menimbulkan rasa tidak senang di hati gadis itu. Apa akan terjadi kepada cinta tiga segi ini?

programme.title: Impiana S4

programme.title: Bintang Minggu Ini
programme.desc: Saksikan konsert dari artis artis popular terus ke rumah anda.

programme.title: Bukan Syurga Pilihan

programme.title: Stella On Stage

programme.title: Kutinggalkan Cinta di Okinawa

programme.title: Kak Kek & Abe Mmasok

programme.title: Lelaki Macam Dia

programme.title: Aiman Tempe Mania The Series

programme.title: Bukan Syurga Pilihan

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Forced into rehab, Morris agrees to coach a misfit softball team of recovering addicts to prove that everyone, despite their past, can hit a home run.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: The story follows an American family who visit a British family they met on holiday.

programme.title: Snow White And The Huntsman
programme.desc: An epic action-adventure with a breathtaking new vision of the legendary tale of Snow White.

programme.title: She Came To Me
programme.desc: A multi-generational love story set against the iconic backdrop of New York.

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: When Iris realizes that she is an AI companion for her boyfriend, she must embrace who she is and fight to survive in a battle for ultimate control.

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Shrek sets out to make things right when he finds himself trapped in a twisted version of Far Far Away, where ogres are hunted and he and Fiona have never met.

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Julia Roberts and Clive Owen star as two sexy spies-turned-corporate operatives in the midst of a clandestine love affair.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes Of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Grindelwald escapes custody and Albus Dumbledore enlists his former student Newt Scamander, who agrees to help, unaware of the dangers that lie ahead.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: An optimistic koala puts on the world's biggest singing competition to save his crumbling theatre in this animated comedy about finding music that lives inside all of us.

programme.title: Harry Potter And The Chamber Of Secrets
programme.desc: The famous boy wizard and his friends are back at Hogwarts to save the school from a terrible evil.

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. Today's major current events can be seen in "Headline Talk Show"! Taiwan shouldn't just have only one voice, nor should Taiwan have only one color. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.title: Super Followers
programme.desc: Join Jacky Wu and Sandy Wu as they bridge generation gaps and co-host this programme that integrates intellectual interviews to present a unique and high-quality variety talk show!

programme.title: Z-Investigation
programme.desc: Hosted by senior CTi News reporter "Old Z", this in-depth social affairs program revisits major cases that once shook Taiwan. Through detailed reexaminations, viewers gain fresh insights into the events that shaped society.

programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. Expecting the viewing of the movie for nearly an hour is a rhythm and fresh, like a cloud and flowing water, which makes the viewers moved and harvests a rich intellectual journey.

programme.title: Kangsi Coming
programme.desc: Lead by Kevin Tsai and Dee Hsu, who never fail to entertain their audience by the fast-paced, humorous and fully self-aware hosting style. The discussions ranging from controvercial topics to gossip and current events. Moreover, surprises from the guests of the show often go beyond all your expectation that you don't want to miss out!

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chen's past insult.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband's playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Lady Of The Law
programme.desc: Chan, the chief of Wan Sheng Escort, is forced to raise his opponent's son, Yim. While Chan forbids Yim to practice martial arts, Yim secretly learns it. Ten years later, a rapist appears and Yim is arrested by a lady constable as the suspect. The rapist turns out to be Chan's elder son and Yim is framed by the Chans. Can Yim prove his innocence?

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider's look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang's popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern - an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all...

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu's until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the men's help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor's plot once again.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong's younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles...

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards' heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Reckless Cricket
programme.desc: Inspired by "Drunken Master", this kung fu comedy features a bumbling martial artist creating a cricket-style fighting arts to fight and defeat the different martial artists who have beaten him before.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Coroner's Diary
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Qin Wan (Landy Li), the daughter of the minister of Dali Temple, relied on her superb medical and forensic skills to join hands with Prince Yan Chi (Ao Rui Peng) to solve unsolved cases and find the real culprit in order to vindicate her father.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: You're Just Not Her
programme.desc: The couple Lam Shun and Ha Lee, living together for years, see their love fading and differences emerging about their future. After a car crash, Ha Lee transforms into a charismatic romantic, but she appears to be a different person entirely. What secrets lie behind this sudden change?

programme.title: You're Just Not Her
programme.desc: The couple Lam Shun and Ha Lee, living together for years, see their love fading and differences emerging about their future. After a car crash, Ha Lee transforms into a charismatic romantic, but she appears to be a different person entirely. What secrets lie behind this sudden change?

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.desc: After Ziva's apparent death, Tony raises their daughter Tali. Years later, Ziva returns, and reunites with Tony. Tony's company is attacked, the family goes to Europe, trying to learn who's after them and to trust each other again.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the World Championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart and discovering there are no job prospects for making music with only your mouth.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S12

programme.title: Federal Slumber Party
programme.desc: Uncle Benji makes a surprise visit to the Templeton Family with a cute baby of his own: Lil Bit Guerrero! Tina gets jealous of Carol doting on Lil Bit, while Benji reveals that in order to make his daughter proud of him, he’s applied to become a Federal Agent. With Boss Baby’s cover at stake, it’s up to the Templeton Family to get Benji out of their hair as he sniffs around for a case that could garner the attention from federal law enforcement.

programme.title: Floaties
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler
programme.desc: Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: Shock and Awww
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Straycation Part I
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: A Cabbage Kinda Day
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally "loses" Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Yeti Superstitious
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his "big bad" year on the zodiac calendar - which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he "breaks up" with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility.

programme.title: Toad-al Recall
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items - but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue.

programme.title: First Flight: Part 2
programme.desc: Tom forges a friendship with the dragon and discovers an entire world of dragons within the fissure.

programme.title: Imperfect Harmony
programme.desc: The Dragon Riders discover a lush island that turns out to be the home of the Deathsong, a massive dragon that threatens to trap them forever.

programme.title: Defiant One
programme.desc: Hiccup and Snotlout struggle to find their way back from Outcast Island.

programme.title: A Game of Fists
programme.desc: When Po and eventually the kids finally make it on the Riverboat, they discover old friends, new enemies, and perplexing cargo.

programme.title: Blue Moon Over Argentina
programme.desc: Odlulu takes the Guitar Key from Wizard Melodia in order to be the best guitar player in Buenos Aires. Only problem is that the Guitar Key is what Wizard Melodia plays the guitar to control the rising & setting of the blue moon every 2.5 years. Wally and Wenda head to Argentina to help Wizard Melodia get the Guitar Key back and put Buenos Aires back to normal.

programme.title: Body Double
programme.desc: In preparation for peace talks with the crocodiles, King Julien hires a body double to go in his place.

programme.title: This Means Warts
programme.desc: When snobby neighbors move in next door and complain about a bone pile blocking their backyard view, The Croods launch into the first-ever prank war.

programme.title: Lucky And The Mysterious Map
programme.desc: During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Battering Ram
programme.desc: When parts go missing from the garage, Ace and Skya solve the mystery when they discover D-Structs has a new claw-tail which they put to the test.

programme.title: Defenders Of The Universe
programme.desc: The Castle is attacked by an alien battle cruiser. The new Paladins must form Voltron for the first time in 10,000 years.

programme.title: Treasure Of The Sierra Marty/Big Baby
programme.desc: Chet, Skidmark and Smoove Move bring swamp toad Marty on an adventure; The snails fumble taking care of a lost human child left at the taco stand.

programme.title: Turboldy Go Part 1/Part 2
programme.desc: A mix-up puts the FAST crew on a rocket bound for outer space; The crew must work together to avoid space madness, debris ... and a fiery re-entry.

programme.title: Happy Pawtomotiversary / Winner, Winner, Lasagna Dinner
programme.desc: Pawston is celebrating the 40th anniversary of Grandmaw and Grandpaw's Pawtomotive Garage! As a surprise, Tag and Paw decide to track down items to recreate the garage to look like it did when it first opened while the rest of the family distract the Grandpawrents. / Tag and Wind face off in the Lasagna Games for a chance to be Sam’s new Crew Chief. A series of lasagna-themed games will challenge their speed, fix-it skills, and leadership. But there can only be one winner.

programme.title: She Said, She Said / Starfish
programme.desc: When one of Rikki’s plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Jarring Jerkiness of the Judge J.O.R.T.S
programme.desc: George and Harold transform their new Spanish teacher into a superhero after they feel guilty for pranking him, but their teacher loves it and gets carried away

programme.title: War of the Cheeks
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Sticky Business
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: Tales from the Fox's Tails
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature keeps stealing people’s prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yi’s prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Magma Comes to the Surface
programme.desc: The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud
programme.desc: Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: The Cleat without Feet / Real Magic
programme.desc: When Phoebe accidentally knocks Harper's soccer cleat off the balcony before the big game, the Dew Drops must venture into the city to retrieve the cleat. / When Dylan starts practicing magic tricks, Athena thinks his magic is real! But when the Dew Drops investigate his "magic hat," they accidentally break it and must fix it before Dylan’s magic show for the neighborhood kids.

programme.title: The Sleepover Save / The Very Hungry Vacuum
programme.desc: Marcus is having his first sleepover and Phoebe is concerned that Marcus may be nervous so Phoebe sets out to make sure he has the best first sleepover ever. / When Athena’s magical jump rope gets sucked up by the family’s new robot vacuum, she loses confidence in her abilities, only to learn that her real abilities are already inside her.

programme.title: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise
programme.desc: When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: The Big Sleep-Walk / Of Course You Can
programme.desc: When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid she’ll embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: The Nest
programme.desc: When the Rescue Riders save Viking chief Duggard, they’re invited to visit his village of Huttsgalor, where they must prove they're kind and helpful.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Somewhere / Over the Rainbow
programme.desc: Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family he’s a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Tacos / Rainy Day
programme.desc: When Kelp is introduced to crunchy tacos in Unicorn Land, he must use his bubble sparks to bring them back to his family underwater. / Kelp’s unicorn friends are going to teach him Swishbee on land. But it rains and the game is called off until Kelp shows them that playing in the water can be even more fun.

programme.title: Lucky and the Doomed Delivery
programme.desc: Lucky, Spirit and the PALs journey to deliver a very special wedding invitation, but they have a surprise waiting when they arrive

programme.title: Lucky and the Doubtful Drought
programme.desc: When Grayson has the only working well during an unexpected heat wave, Lucky has to find an alternate source of water

programme.title: Bootless Cries
programme.desc: After Puss decides everything bad happening in town is his fault and pursues a new career, the Mole King invades San Lorenzo and changes everything

programme.title: Sullen Earth
programme.desc: When the Mole King kidnaps Uli, Puss realizes that confidence alone isn't always enough ammunition to defeat a powerful army

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool
programme.desc: After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Chaser And Chewer / Recipe For Adventure
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch pretend to be their favorite comic book heroes and help the dogs of Pawston. But when Frank and Beans pretend to be villains it’s up to Chaser and Chewer to stop the trouble makers and save the day. \ It’s Bring Your Own Bowl Night at the Barker house, and Tag and Grandmaw team up to make Great Great Auntie Eunice's Famous Far Fetched Cookies. But the obscure ingredients are hard to find, so they have to team up and go on an adventure.

programme.title: Somewhere / Over the Rainbow
programme.desc: Kelp is swept by an ocean current to the shore of Unicorn Land where he sees a majestic creature on a cliff that looks just like him, but not like his Narwhal family under the sea. Kelp tells his family he’s a unicorn. / Kelp returns to Unicorn Land where he meets Pixie and Juniper, who show him around and introduce him to unicorn spark and magic.

programme.title: Breaking The Bank
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina’s new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Hate That Baby!
programme.desc: After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits’ attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: North of the Border
programme.desc: With his identity as a fugitive businessman exposed, Boss Baby has been hiding out in the lawless land of Canada. But he’s forced back into action over a new crisis with Baby Love: several criminals have copycatted Boss’s fugitive strategy, somehow turning themselves into babies to hide out from the law. While Tina works on exposing these new fake baby criminals to the world, Boss makes a dangerous journey across Canada to sneak back over the U.S. border.

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada
programme.desc: Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: Shock and Awww
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: Straycation Part I
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 1
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: Chinese Nian Year Pt. 2
programme.desc: Yi realizes that Peng and Everest were taken by Nian, the legendary dragon-like creature associated with Chinese New Year - and he’s also taken their other creature friends! With Burnish and Duchess’ help, Yi and Jin travel outside of the city to find Nian’s cave. But a skirmish in the cave drives the conflict with Nian back to the city, wreacking havoc on the festival. The crew and creatures band together to try to stop Nian, but they’re no match.

programme.title: Wu You Gonna Call?
programme.desc: After the reveal of magical creatures’ existence and Yi’s magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the city’s citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their "creature awareness" message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: First Flight: Part 1

programme.title: A Hole New World
programme.desc: Tom and Jun encounter unexpected dangers and are separated while exploring the Hidden Realm of dragons. Tom introduces Jun to the dragon world, and Jun bonds with a dragon of her own - Wu and Wei.

programme.title: Breaking The Bank
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tina’s new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Hate That Baby!
programme.desc: After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits’ attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.desc: For 10 year-old Hector, the coming weekend is certain to be a very special one. He's about to meet his father, someone he hardly knows, and spend two days and two nights with him.

programme.title: Un Soupcon
programme.desc: A man's corpse is found in his torched car. Pascal, the victim, was drugged before being executed. Suspicions lead Captain Delboscq on the trail of Isabelle, the deceased's wife. Her very ordinary-looking life is full of disturbing and suspicious details.

programme.title: Un Soupcon
programme.desc: While Delboscq is trying to shine a light on Isabelle's difficult past and her complex relationship with Pascal, new clues point to the victim's family. The son, Jeremie, is particularly hostile to his mother, and also criticized his father for his gambling addiction.

programme.title: Reunion Island: school for four
programme.desc: In the heart of Mafate, on Reunion Island, lies ilet a Bourse, a hamlet cut off from the rest of the world, from roads and from the hustle and bustle of urban life. Sophie, the local primary school teacher, runs a small class of just four pupils.

programme.title: Hors Limites
programme.desc: A multinational executive is murdered on a chairlift in the heart of the French Alps. Swiss Captain Andreas Meyer, who is visiting his daughter, gets involved in the investigation when he discovers that Franzisca, his childhood sweetheart and the victim's boss, is a suspect.

programme.title: Simone Pheulpin / Julian Klausner / Sophie Brillouet
programme.desc: The Albert-Kahn museum unveils the banker's humanist project. Sometimes called ''the time folder'', Simone Pheulpin works with cotton ribbon. For his first show at Dries Van Noten, Julian Klausner plays with textures and colours. Sophie Brillouet's studio is alive with beach air.

programme.desc: Embark on a regal journey with "Oh! My Queen" to craft a refreshingly down-to-earth entertainment experience! Delving into topics that resonate with everyone, each episode unfolds with lively discussions, injecting humor and joy into our daily lives, your go-to remedy for stress and a guaranteed laughter-inducing escape!

programme.title: Ride the Wind 2025
programme.desc: Ride the Wind 2025 takes the stage outdoors for the first time, breaking boundaries with an open-air performance like never before. With unstoppable determination, the Sisters forge ahead, embracing the unknown and embarking on five extraordinary journeys. Get ready for an electrifying season filled with surprises and brilliance!

programme.title: The Chinese Feast
programme.desc: Sun wants to start a new life as a chef in Canada and struggles to learn cooking skills from a restaurant owner, Au. While Sun will represent his restaurant to participate in a cooking competition, his skill is not good enough, and he has to seek help from a legendary master chef in order to win the ultimate challenge.

programme.title: Face to Face
programme.desc: Tamotsu dies in a skiing accident and his roommate Yoshio marries his wife as well as inherits his entire fortune. At Tamotsu's funeral, Yoshio sees a badly disfigured old man and that is only the beginning of an evil downfall for him...

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 97
programme.desc: Mr Lo has three sons, Leung, Fay and Kung; and a daughter-in-law, Eliza. While they seem like a normal family, their relationships need mending. Leung and Fay play a prank on their brother Kung on his birthday by falsely claiming that he has won the lottery. This sets off a chain reaction of funny mishaps that finally brings the family together.

programme.title: The Illegal Immigrant
programme.desc: This is a gritty and realistic Chinatown tale about the life of a Chinese illegal immigrant and his journey in New York. He is looking for a fake marriage with a girl so as to gain the right of abode there. Despite all the hardships and misfortunes, he tries to cope with life and reach for his dreams.

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 2
programme.desc: Fanny appears to be an ordinary housewife but is in fact a mahjong expert. Deeply in love with her husband, she loses to a seductive woman, Curvy, both on the mahjong table and in competing for her husband's love. With the help from her mahjong master, Fanny vows to take on Curvy in the Mahjong King tournament!

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the school's stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quin's trust, Nick becomes his protege and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: My Darling Genie
programme.desc: A genie who is trapped in a Chinese oil umbrella helps an honorable young man and his uncle to deal with a covetous loan shark.

programme.title: The Demon Inside
programme.desc: A prolific serial killer's confession in the murder of a young woman turns out to be a hoax but, decades later, a more likely suspect is ready to talk - under one condition.

programme.title: DUI Bride
programme.desc: A man hurls furniture onto a busy NYC street from atop a skyscraper; a self-proclaimed bride is arrested for DUI on her supposed wedding day, and more!

programme.title: I Have To Poop!
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a desperate woman needs to poop during a traffic stop; a mom is busted sneaking into a school dressed as her daughter; and more!

programme.desc: Rebecca and Lee Cawthon enjoy inviting other people into their relationship - it's how they got together. After striking up a relationship with Alite, they also get intimate with her school friend.

programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: Law And Graces
programme.desc: Hong Kong is a society ruled by law, but the general public does not have a deep understanding of the law and may fall foul of it any time! This show invites guests on to discuss legal myths and fallacies in a light-hearted and easy-to-digest manner.

programme.title: Scoop 2025

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.desc: The Barbababies decide to create a show and go all out! // Barbotine wants to create the best lemonade.

programme.desc: Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Chatterbox

programme.title: The Blackberry Bush
programme.desc: Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: Fight Flight Or Flee
programme.desc: In Ohio, cops face a hostage situation with a dangerous fugitive. In Maryland, armed robbers are caught in the act and run from the law.

programme.title: Farmhouse Family Reunion
programme.desc: Steve and Leanne update a family farmhouse while keeping its rich history intact.

programme.title: On The Trail Of The Salt Caravans In The Sea Of S
programme.desc: Adventurer Fritz Meineck ventures into remote regions of the world to complete seemingly impossible challenges, with no outside help and limited equipment.

programme.title: Crying Wolf
programme.desc: In New Mexico, an inmate faking a heart attack jumps a prison guard. In Nebraska, a family faces a firework attack by a random family.

programme.title: From The Outside In
programme.desc: Mike and Carmine take a little inspiration from nature and convert a family's home into a California Craftsman with an organic edge.

programme.title: Helenes Appalachian Hellscape
programme.desc: Hurricane Helene barrels north, causing massive flooding in Appalachia. As the deluge sweeps away one woman, a man jumps into the water to save her.

programme.title: Wolf Lake Escape
programme.desc: New parents look to move from the city to a small, rustic lake community in Wolf Lake, NY. But the properties need huge renovations.

programme.title: On The Trail Of The Salt Caravans In The Sea Of S
programme.desc: Adventurer Fritz Meineck ventures into remote regions of the world to complete seemingly impossible challenges, with no outside help and limited equipment.

programme.title: Fight Flight Or Flee
programme.desc: In Ohio, cops face a hostage situation with a dangerous fugitive. In Maryland, armed robbers are caught in the act and run from the law.

programme.title: They Might Be Giants
programme.desc: As Joe fights to keep his lead, all bets are off when a legend joins the derby. Emmett struggles without a plane until his dad harpoons a giant.

programme.title: Forged In Fury
programme.desc: As the first Siberian storm slams the grounds, Sig sets into 40-knot winds, risking capsizing when his tank floods.

programme.title: Chasing Africas Atlantis
programme.desc: The once-luxurious emporium of Rhapta disappeared centuries ago. Josh Gates dives into remote waters off Zanzibar in search of Africa's Atlantis.

programme.title: Uncovering Australia's Secrets
programme.desc: Josh Gates goes on an epic journey through the Australian outback to find a legendary field of gold.

programme.title: Red Tape
programme.desc: In the wake of sudden Government shutdowns, The Bushmen are forced back into their deadly mine.

programme.title: Mayday Mayday
programme.desc: In Oregon, a man vandalises "The Goonies" house before stealing a yacht. In Texas, a shootout with police leaves one officer critically injured.

programme.title: Back To Jail
programme.desc: A suspected drunk driver amuses cops. Plus, Jiu-Jitsu Master defends a convenience store, and a murderer escapes from prison and runs from the law.

programme.title: Public Panic
programme.desc: Customers battle in a mall while chaos erupts on a baseball field. A civilian helps a tired cop, and an angry customer erupts in a fast-food outlet.

programme.title: Seaborne Sacrifice
programme.desc: In the landmark 20th season of the series, King Crab reopens for the first time in years, igniting a derby-style race not seen since season one.

programme.title: Boom Phase
programme.desc: At the mid-season peak, three centuries-old fishing strategies compete. Joe relies on instinct, Tyler turns to science, and Niko relies on tradition.

programme.title: Korea Open Tennis Championships 2025 Presented by Motiva (500) Day 3 Session 1
programme.desc: The Korea Open is a professional tennis tournament held in Seoul, South Korea. The tournament takes place at the Seoul Olympic Park Tennis Center. It was first held in 2004 and has been a regular fixture on the WTA calendar ever since.
